tool_description: Get email addresses from Facebook pages.
name: Facebook Email Collector
title: Facebook Email Collector

api_list.name: get_status_api_task__task_id__get
api_list.description: Use this API to get current status of a task, including result if task is finished

api_list.name: health_health_get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-email-collector.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-email-collector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-email-collector.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-email-collector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
